attributes.additional_details: Leaving the courts open  will keep covid 19 circulating
attributes.background: Front of house security staff are unable to socially distance in some circumstances

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition calling for a temporary ban on in-person trials, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
